pulpcore.net
Class Download

java.lang.Object
  pulpcore.net.Download
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Download
extends Object
implements Runnable

Downloads a file into memory. Handles partial HTTP downloads if the first attempt downloads only a portion of the file.
